overview.title: Why Choose Aluminum?
overview.content: Aluminum ornamental fencing delivers the classic elegance of wrought iron without the maintenance headaches. Our Ultra Aluminum products feature industrial-grade powder coating that resists rust, fading, and chipping for decades.
overview.additionalContent: Perfect for pool enclosures (meets all Ohio safety codes), front yards, and properties where you want to showcase landscaping while maintaining security. Aluminum is also the ideal choice for slopes and uneven terrain.

faqs.question: Will aluminum fence rust?
faqs.answer: No. Aluminum does not rust. Our fencing features industrial powder-coat finish that resists fading, chipping, and weathering for decades. It's ideal for Ohio's wet weather.

faqs.question: Is aluminum fence strong enough for dogs?
faqs.answer: Yes, for most dogs. Aluminum is lighter than steel but still very durable. For large, aggressive dogs, we may recommend chain link instead. We'll assess your specific needs at the estimate.

faqs.question: Does aluminum fence meet pool safety codes?
faqs.answer: Yes. Our 4ft+ aluminum options meet Ohio pool safety requirements including proper picket spacing and self-closing/self-latching gate hardware. We ensure compliant installation.

faqs.question: Can aluminum fence follow slopes?
faqs.answer: Yes! Aluminum fence 'racks' to follow ground contours, making it ideal for sloped yards. Each panel adjusts to match the terrain while maintaining a consistent top line.
